name: ONE NIGHT In the life of...?
name_original: ONE NIGHT In the life of...?
description:
It’s a great day for the gaming industry, and you’re a horrible game dev. At least, that’s what you tell yourself. But who exactly are you? It's time to find out.

This game was developed as part of a university project delving into industry disruptors. Playing through the game you get to experience the development of a famous indie game and how you, the game developer, are working to change the industry for the better.
